messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling dance troupe :-)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/17/2003 3:52:34 PM Central Standard Time, ... I can relate.  We re still really into ballet.  Swan Lake repeatedly for 3 weeks and now
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/17/2003 3:52:34 PM Central Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:


> I've just come downstairs and found my 3 kids trying to get a dance routine
> going to Donna Summers 'Hot Stuff'

I can relate. We're still really into ballet. Swan Lake repeatedly for 3
weeks and now interspersed with Nutcracker, Cinderella and irish dancing.
Just finished sewing two capes for the kids - my boy's is the one with the
sequence. We've been non-stop dancing for almost two months.

I can only imagine how it will wear on you to hear Donna Summers over and
over and over!

Elizabeth

It's fab

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling dance troupe :-)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/17/03 11:49:43 AM, shyrley.williams@verizon.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/17/03 11:49:43 AM, shyrley.williams@... writes:

<< We watched the Full Monty about a week ago and I oredered the sound track.
I've just come downstairs and found my 3 kids trying to get a dance routine
going to Donna Summers 'Hot Stuff' >>

There was a Disco special last night, on TV, called "The Disco Ball." (Good
name.)

A friend of mine had called and said "The Village People are on Channel 7,"
and we pretty much watched it for the next two hours. Kept doing other
things, and calling people in when something particularly good was on.

Holly noted whenever a song had been used in "The Adventures of Priscilla,
Queen of the Desert."

Sandra

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling dance troupe :-)
messages.msgSnippet: What is a green gathering? Blessings. Deb ... From: Shyrley [mailto:shyrley.williams@verizon.net] Sent: Friday, January 17, 2003 1:56 PM To:
messages.messageBody:
What is a green gathering?

Blessings.
Deb


-----Original Message-----
From: Shyrley [mailto:shyrley.williams@...]
Sent: Friday, January 17, 2003 1:56 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling dance troupe :-)



This will make you smile (hopefully)

We watched the Full Monty about a week ago and I oredered the sound track.
I've just come downstairs and found my 3 kids trying to get a dance routine
going to Donna Summers 'Hot Stuff'

They weren't stripping (cos thats gross says Heather) but planning a dance
group so they can earn money at the Green Gathering this year :-)

I thought it was funny enough to share

Shyrley

messages.subject: Unschooling dance troupe :-)
messages.msgSnippet: This will make you smile (hopefully) We watched the Full Monty about a week ago and I oredered the sound track. I ve just come downstairs and found my 3 kids
messages.messageBody:
This will make you smile (hopefully)

We watched the Full Monty about a week ago and I oredered the sound track.
I've just come downstairs and found my 3 kids trying to get a dance routine going to Donna Summers 'Hot Stuff'

They weren't stripping (cos thats gross says Heather) but planning a dance group so they can earn money at the Green Gathering this year :-)

I thought it was funny enough to share

Shyrley
